description.title: Brands Participating in the Promotion
description.paragraph3: The summer vibe continues, and along with it, the musical drive! So, we invite everyone to the coolest SUMMER MUSIC FESTIVAL at Port Mall Shopping Center!
description.paragraph4: Groovy electronic music will light up your hearts, and cool DJs: Dj Antai, Dj Kinree, DJ Evka, MC Nastya Chornychna will provide unforgettable experiences...
